metadata.name: The Question
metadata.description:
Women have the right to freedom of choice when it comes to what they wear. This includes the right to choose clothing that reflects their personal style, cultural background, and religious beliefs. Clothing choices are a form of self-expression and personal autonomy, and women should be able to make these choices without fear of judgment or persecution. In a society that values diversity and equality, it is important to respect the right of women to make their own clothing choices. This means rejecting attempts to impose dress codes or other restrictions on what women can wear. Women deserve the freedom to dress as they please, without interference or coercion.

In this piece of art, I want to ask the audience why women still have to discuss their appearance with their society. Why are they arrested in some countries? And Why are they under pressure for this right? So many Questions...

This art is also available as 3D garnment (CLO3D).
